notes: Very modern studio apartment with high-end finishes, designer furniture, and excellent condition. Note: Image 1 appears to be a 3D render, while images 2-4 show the actual unit which is smaller but still nicely renovated. Baby safety concerns include the visible staircase/loft area with metal railings in image 4, and the small balcony visible in image 3. Space is quite compact at ~27 sqm which may be challenging with a baby.
